comments.body:
why do you want to test this? It's external to this module (and non essential IMO)
I"ve rather test if returned instance matches base contract

Because the `ReportBase` return type does not come from this package, but from `istanbul-lib-report`. Therefore, I think it makes sense to assert that the type returned behaves as it would be used with the `report` package. This is the real world code snippet from the package: https://github.com/istanbuljs/istanbuljs/tree/master/packages/istanbul-lib-report
